title: 99/512/EC: Commission Decision of 8 July 1999 amending Decision 96/233/EC establishing the list of approved fish farms in Denmark (notified under document number C(1999) 2036) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 8 July 1999
amending Decision 96/233/EC establishing the list of approved fish farms in Denmark
(notified under document number C(1999) 2036)
(Text with EEA relevance)
(1999/512/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 96/233/EC is replaced by the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 July 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 46, 19.2.1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 189, 3.7.1998, p. 12.
(3) OJ L 27, 4.2.1993, p. 35.
(4) OJ L 72, 21.3.1996, p. 39.
(5) OJ L 77, 27.3.1996, p. 33.
(6) OJ L 94, 9.4.1997, p. 15.
